item.title: “A Core Language with Extensible Language Libraries”
item.description: Click to view on seperate page… /u/jaxrtech True, the proposal is very abstract. To be a bit more concrete, here’s what trying to create a hypothetical implementation might look like running down pipeline from the diagram: Clients: Just about any IDE or editor has an API for code completion, rename refactoring, etc. Given your favorite editor, we would just need >to write a shim for to talk over platform’s protocol to interface the API.
